newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: TABLE - Dragon Oil narrows loss in year.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Dragon Oil narrows loss in year.

text.p: NOTE - Turnover consists of $2.70 on continuing operations and $7.74 million on acquisitions in 1996, and of $2.64 million on continuing operations and $1.67 on discontinued operations in 1995.
Full company name - Dragon Oil Plc
